name: react-mfe
description: React micro-frontend PoC with Webpack Module Federation, Lerna and Typescript

scripts.start: npx kill-port 8000 && npx kill-port 8001 && npx kill-port 8002 && npx kill-port 8003 && npx kill-port 8004 && npx kill-port 5000 && lerna run --parallel start
scripts.start:app: npx kill-port 8000 && yarn workspace app-shell start
scripts.start:users: npx kill-port 8001 && yarn workspace users start
scripts.start:posts: npx kill-port 8002 && yarn workspace posts start
scripts.start:server: npx kill-port 5000 && yarn workspace fake-server start
